<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Get schedule the Payment of a Bill transaction"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/payment/payment-slip/scheduler/pactualId/{pactualId}"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Use this endpoint in order to get schedule a payment of a submitted Bill payment to our API from your own application.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

>
  
</ParamsDetails>
